component.name: Ásbrú Connection Manager
component.summary: User interface that helps organizing remote terminal sessions and automating repetitive tasks

description.p: Ásbrú Connection Manager is a user interface that helps organizing remote terminal sessions and automating repetitive tasks.
This modernized version supports both X11 and Wayland display servers, with enhanced compatibility for modern desktop environments including Cosmic, GNOME, and KDE.
Runtime and packaging hardening, system proxy fallback, standardized SSH user@host formatting, AppImage metadata verification, and stabilized tests.
